entries.title: Apple’s focus on secrecy violated employee rights, US regulators find
entries.description: Ex-employees complained to NLRB about Apple rules and a Tim Cook email.

entries.title: No more export licenses: US plans to fully cut off Huawei from chip suppliers
entries.description: After years of loopholes, reports say Huawei will fully lose access to US chips.

entries.title: US still has the worst, most expensive health care of any high-income country
entries.description: US health care has lagged peers for years, and the pandemic made things worse.

entries.title: How to tell if your cats are playing or fighting—and whether it’s a problem
entries.description: Reciprocity is the key. And occasional squabbles don't mean your cats hate each other.

entries.title: DOJ probes AI tool that’s allegedly biased against families with disabilities
entries.description: Pennsylvania county's child welfare algorithm has inspired tools in other states.

entries.title: The next de-extinction target: The dodo
entries.description: Bird reproduction will make bringing the dodo back a big challenge.

entries.title: ChromeOS and Microsoft 365 will start playing nicer with each other this year
entries.description: Microsoft and Google balance working together and competing with one another.

entries.title: Lenovo announces a $2,345 FHD smart display for video calls
entries.description: Two parts videoconferencing display, one part monitor.

entries.title: Samsung’s Q4 profits plummet 69 percent, hit 8-year low
entries.description: And the Galaxy S23 launch tomorrow probably won't save Samsung.

entries.title: Sony halves reported sales expectations for coming PSVR2 headset
entries.description: High price, reliance on console could limit the new headset's market impact.

entries.title: Biden to end US COVID-19 emergency declarations on May 11
entries.description: The announcement comes as other health experts see a pivotal point in the pandemic.

entries.title: Tesla tells investors it’s being investigated by the Justice Department
entries.description: The carmaker's 10-K confirms reports from 2022 that the feds are unhappy.

entries.title: The 2024 Hyundai Ioniq 6 gets an official EPA range of 361 miles
entries.description: Great aerodynamics help, but you'll want the smaller wheels for max range.

entries.title: Best SSD and RAM deals to boost your PC’s performance
entries.description: Get more PC power without having to buy a new PC

entries.title: Crew Dragon astronauts to receive rare space medal from the White House
entries.description: Outside of space circles, the space medal is not a particularly well-known honor.

entries.title: New wind, solar are cheaper than costs to operate all but one US coal plant
entries.description: New analysis shows that renewables beat existing coal plants 99% of the time.

entries.title: How to control your smart home without yelling at a dumb voice assistant
entries.description: You can have nice, automated things without learning how to shout at speakers.
